Title: Random Shoes
Plot: Eugene Jones wakes up, finding himself lying on the middle of a road. He then discovers that he has been the victim of a hit-and-run incident, and is, now, not only dead, but invisible. Eugene recalls events leading up to his death, involving a mysterious alien eye. Simultaneously, Gwen investigates the suspicious circumstances around his fatality.
GuestStars: Steve Meo, Luke Bromley, Roger Ashton-Griffiths, Nicola Duffett,  Ryan Chappell,  Leroy Libyrd,  Paul Chequer,  Amy Starling,  Joshua Hughes, Gareth Potter, Robyn Isaac, Celyn Jones
